verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> cause Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> her abominations; <S%H8441><s%>

and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H136><s%> to Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> Your birth <S%H4351><s%> and your birth <S%H4138><s%> is of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite; <S%H3669><s%> the Amorite <S%H567><s%> was your father, <S%H1><s%> and your mother <S%H517><s%> was a Hittite. <S%H2850><s%>

As for your birth, <S%H4138><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> you were born <S%H3205><s%> your navel <S%H8270><s%> was not cut, <S%H3772><s%> neither were you washed <S%H7364><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%> to cleanse <S%H4935><s%> you; <S%H4414><s%> you weren't salted at all, <S%H4414><s%> nor swaddled <S%H2853><s%> at all. <S%H2853><s%>

No eye <S%H5869><s%> pitied <S%H2347><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> to do any <S%H259><s%> of these things to you, <S%H2550><s%> to have compassion on you; <S%H7993><s%> but you were cast out in the open <S%H6440><s%> field, <S%H7704><s%> for that your person <S%H5315><s%> was abhorred, <S%H1604><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that you were born. <S%H3205><s%>

When I passed <S%H5674><s%> by you, <S%H7200><s%> and saw you wallowing <S%H947><s%> in your blood, <S%H1818><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H1818><s%> Though you are in your blood, live; <S%H2421><s%> yes, <S%H559><s%> I said to you, <S%H1818><s%> Though you are in your blood, live. <S%H2421><s%>

I caused <S%H5414><s%> you to multiply <S%H7233><s%> as that which grows <S%H6780><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and you increased <S%H7235><s%> and grew great, <S%H1431><s%> and you attained <S%H935><s%> to excellent <S%H5716><s%> ornament; <S%H5716><s%> your breasts <S%H7699><s%> were fashioned, <S%H3559><s%> and your hair <S%H8181><s%> was grown; <S%H6779><s%> yet you were naked <S%H5903><s%> and bore. <S%H6181><s%>

Now when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by you, <S%H7200><s%> and looked at you, <S%H6256><s%> behold, your time was the time <S%H6256><s%> of love; <S%H1730><s%> and I spread <S%H6566><s%> my skirt <S%H3671><s%> over you, <S%H3680><s%> and covered your nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> yes, <S%H7650><s%> I swore to you, <S%H935><s%> and entered into a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> and you became mine.
Then washed <S%H7364><s%> I you with water; <S%H4325><s%> yes, <S%H7857><s%> I thoroughly washed away your blood <S%H1818><s%> from you, <S%H5480><s%> and I anointed you with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

I clothed <S%H3847><s%> you also with embroidered work, <S%H7553><s%> and shod <S%H5274><s%> you with sealskin, <S%H8476><s%> and I dressed <S%H2280><s%> you about with fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> you with silk. <S%H4897><s%>
I decked <S%H5710><s%> you with ornaments, <S%H5716><s%> and I put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on your hands, <S%H3027><s%> and a chain <S%H7242><s%> on your neck. <S%H1627><s%>
I put <S%H5414><s%> a ring <S%H5141><s%> on your nose, <S%H639><s%> and earrings <S%H5694><s%> in your ears, <S%H241><s%> and a beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crown <S%H5850><s%> on your head. <S%H7218><s%>

Thus you were decked <S%H5710><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver; <S%H3701><s%> and your clothing <S%H4403><s%> was of fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and silk, <S%H4897><s%> and embroidered work; <S%H7553><s%> you ate <S%H398><s%> fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> and oil; <S%H8081><s%> and you were exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> beautiful, <S%H3302><s%> and you prospered <S%H6743><s%> to royal estate. <S%H4410><s%>

Your renown <S%H8034><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> for your beauty; <S%H3308><s%> for it was perfect, <S%H3632><s%> through my majesty <S%H1926><s%> which I had put <S%H7760><s%> on you, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

But you trusted <S%H982><s%> in your beauty, <S%H3308><s%> and played the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> because of your renown, <S%H8034><s%> and poured out <S%H8210><s%> your prostitution <S%H8457><s%> on everyone who passed by; <S%H5674><s%> his it was.

You took <S%H3947><s%> of your garments, <S%H899><s%> and made for yourselves high places <S%H1116><s%> decked <S%H6213><s%> with various colors, <S%H2921><s%> and played the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> on them: <S%H935><s%> the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

You also took <S%H3947><s%> your beautiful <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of my gold <S%H2091><s%> and of my silver, <S%H3701><s%> which I had given <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> and made for yourself images <S%H6754><s%> of men, <S%H2145><s%> and played the prostitute with them; <S%H2181><s%>

and you took <S%H3947><s%> your embroidered <S%H7553><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> them, <S%H5414><s%> and set my oil <S%H8081><s%> and my incense <S%H7004><s%> before them. <S%H6440><s%>

My bread <S%H3899><s%> also which I gave <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H5560><s%> fine flour, and oil, <S%H8081><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> with which I fed <S%H398><s%> you, <S%H5414><s%> you even set it before <S%H6440><s%> them for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma; <S%H7381><s%> and thus it was, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

Moreover you have taken <S%H3947><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> whom you have borne <S%H3205><s%> to me, <S%H2076><s%> and you have sacrificed these to them to be devoured. <S%H398><s%> Was your prostitution <S%H8457><s%> a small matter, <S%H4592><s%>
that you have slain <S%H7819><s%> my sons, <S%H1121><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> them up, <S%H5674><s%> in causing them to pass through the fire to them?

In all your abominations <S%H8441><s%> and your prostitution <S%H8457><s%> you have not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> when you were naked <S%H5903><s%> and bore, <S%H6181><s%> and were wallowing <S%H947><s%> in your blood. <S%H1818><s%>
It has happened after <S%H310><s%> all your wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> (woe, <S%H188><s%> woe <S%H188><s%> to you! <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%>),
that you have built <S%H1129><s%> for yourselves a vaulted place, <S%H1354><s%> and have made <S%H6213><s%> yourselves a lofty place <S%H7413><s%> in every street. <S%H7339><s%>

You have built <S%H1129><s%> your lofty place <S%H7413><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of every way, <S%H1870><s%> and have made your beauty <S%H3308><s%> a abomination, <S%H8581><s%> and have opened <S%H6589><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> to everyone who passed by, <S%H5674><s%> and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your prostitution. <S%H8457><s%>

You have also committed sexual immorality <S%H2181><s%> with the Egyptians, <S%H1121><s%> your neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> great <S%H1432><s%> of flesh; <S%H1320><s%> and have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your prostitution, <S%H8457><s%> to provoke me to anger. <S%H3707><s%>

See therefore, <S%H5186><s%> I have stretched out my hand <S%H3027><s%> over you, <S%H1639><s%> and have diminished your ordinary <S%H2706><s%> food, <S%H5414><s%> and delivered you to the will <S%H5315><s%> of those who hate <S%H8130><s%> you, <S%H1323><s%> the daughters of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> who are ashamed <S%H3637><s%> of your lewd <S%H2154><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%>

You have played the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> also with the Assyrians, <S%H1121><s%> because <S%H1115><s%> you were insatiable; <S%H7646><s%> yes, <S%H2181><s%> you have played the prostitute with them, <S%H7654><s%> and yet you weren't satisfied.

You have moreover multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your prostitution <S%H8457><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of merchants, <S%H3667><s%> to Chaldea; <S%H3778><s%> and yet you weren't <S%H7646><s%> satisfied with this. <S%H2063><s%>

How weak <S%H535><s%> is your heart, <S%H3826><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> since you do <S%H6213><s%> all these things, <S%H4639><s%> the work of a impudent <S%H7986><s%> <S%H99999><s%> prostitute; <S%H2181><s%>

in that you build <S%H1129><s%> your vaulted place <S%H1354><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of every way, <S%H1870><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> your lofty place <S%H7413><s%> in every street, <S%H7339><s%> and have not been as a prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> in that you scorn <S%H7046><s%> pay. <S%H868><s%>
A wife <S%H802><s%> who commits adultery! <S%H5003><s%> who takes <S%H3947><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> instead of her husband! <S%H376><s%>

They give <S%H5414><s%> gifts <S%H5078><s%> to all prostitutes; <S%H2181><s%> but you give <S%H5414><s%> your gifts <S%H5083><s%> to all your lovers, <S%H157><s%> and bribe <S%H7809><s%> them, <S%H935><s%> that they may come to you on every side <S%H5439><s%> for your prostitution. <S%H8457><s%>

You are different <S%H2016><s%> from other women <S%H802><s%> in your prostitution, <S%H8457><s%> in that no one follows <S%H310><s%> you to play the prostitute; <S%H2181><s%> and whereas you give <S%H5414><s%> hire, <S%H868><s%> and no hire <S%H868><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> to you, <S%H1961><s%> therefore you are different. <S%H2016><s%>
Therefore, <S%H2181><s%> prostitute, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> Because your filthiness <S%H5178><s%> was poured out, <S%H8210><s%> and your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> uncovered <S%H1540><s%> through your prostitution <S%H8457><s%> with your lovers; <S%H157><s%> and because of all the idols <S%H1544><s%> of your abominations, <S%H8441><s%> and for the blood <S%H1818><s%> of your sons, <S%H1121><s%> that you gave to them; <S%H5414><s%>

therefore see, <S%H6908><s%> I will gather all your lovers, <S%H157><s%> with whom you have taken pleasure, <S%H6149><s%> and all those who you have loved, <S%H157><s%> with all those who you have hated; <S%H8130><s%> I will even gather <S%H6908><s%> them against you on every side, <S%H5439><s%> and will uncover <S%H1540><s%> your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> to them, <S%H7200><s%> that they may see all your nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you, <S%H5003><s%> as women who break wedlock and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> are judged; <S%H4941><s%> and I will bring <S%H5414><s%> on you the blood <S%H1818><s%> of wrath <S%H2534><s%> and jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>

I will also give <S%H5414><s%> you into their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they shall throw down <S%H2040><s%> your vaulted place, <S%H1354><s%> and break down <S%H5422><s%> your lofty places; <S%H7413><s%> and they shall strip <S%H6584><s%> you of your clothes, <S%H899><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> your beautiful <S%H8597><s%> jewels; <S%H3627><s%> and they shall leave <S%H3240><s%> you naked <S%H5903><s%> and bore. <S%H6181><s%>

They shall also bring up <S%H5927><s%> a company <S%H6951><s%> against you, <S%H7275><s%> and they shall stone you with stones, <S%H68><s%> and thrust you through <S%H1333><s%> with their swords. <S%H2719><s%>

They shall burn <S%H8313><s%> your houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> women; <S%H802><s%> and I will cause you to cease <S%H7673><s%> from playing the prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> and you shall also give <S%H5414><s%> no hire any more. <S%H868><s%>

So will I cause my wrath <S%H2534><s%> toward you to rest, <S%H5117><s%> and my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from you, <S%H8252><s%> and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry. <S%H3707><s%>

Because you have not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> but have raged <S%H7264><s%> against me in all these things; <S%H1887><s%> therefore, behold, I also will bring <S%H5414><s%> your way <S%H1870><s%> on your head, <S%H7218><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> and you shall not commit <S%H6213><s%> this lewdness <S%H2154><s%> with all your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>
Behold, <S%H4911><s%> everyone who uses proverbs shall use this proverb <S%H4911><s%> against you, <S%H559><s%> saying, As is the mother, <S%H517><s%> so is her daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

You are the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of your mother, <S%H517><s%> who loathes <S%H1602><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> and her sons; <S%H1121><s%> and you are the sister <S%H269><s%> of your sisters, <S%H269><s%> who loathed <S%H1602><s%> their husbands <S%H582><s%> and their sons: <S%H1121><s%> your mother <S%H517><s%> was a Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and your father <S%H1><s%> a Amorite. <S%H567><s%>

Your elder <S%H1419><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> is Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> who dwells <S%H3427><s%> at your left hand, <S%H8040><s%> she and her daughters; <S%H1323><s%> and your younger <S%H6996><s%> sister, <S%H269><s%> who dwells <S%H3427><s%> at your right hand, <S%H3225><s%> is Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Yet have you not walked <S%H1980><s%> in their ways, <S%H1870><s%> nor done <S%H6213><s%> after their abominations; <S%H8441><s%> but, <S%H6985><s%> as if that were a very little <S%H4592><s%> thing, <S%H7843><s%> you were more corrupt than they <S%H2004><s%> in all your ways. <S%H1870><s%>

As I live, <S%H2416><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> your sister <S%H269><s%> has not done, <S%H6213><s%> she nor her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> as you have done, <S%H6213><s%> you and your daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Behold, <S%H5771><s%> this was the iniquity of your sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom: <S%H5467><s%> pride, <S%H1347><s%> fullness <S%H7653><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and prosperous <S%H7962><s%> ease <S%H8252><s%> was in her and in her daughters; <S%H1323><s%> neither did she strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%>
They were haughty, <S%H1361><s%> and committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me: <S%H5493><s%> therefore I took them away as I saw good. <S%H7200><s%>

Neither has Samaria <S%H8111><s%> committed <S%H2398><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of your sins; <S%H2403><s%> but you have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> more than they, <S%H2007><s%> and have justified <S%H6663><s%> your sisters <S%H269><s%> by all your abominations <S%H8441><s%> which you have done. <S%H6213><s%>

You also, <S%H5375><s%> bear you your own shame, <S%H3639><s%> in that you have given judgment <S%H6419><s%> for your sisters; <S%H269><s%> through your sins <S%H2403><s%> that you have committed more abominable <S%H8581><s%> than they, <S%H2004><s%> they are more righteous <S%H6663><s%> that you: <S%H954><s%> yes, be also confounded, and bear <S%H5375><s%> your shame, <S%H3639><s%> in that you have justified <S%H6663><s%> your sisters. <S%H269><s%>

I will turn again <S%H7725><s%> their captivity, <S%H7622><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of your captives <S%H7622><s%> in their midst; <S%H8432><s%>
that you may bear <S%H5375><s%> your own shame, <S%H3639><s%> and may be ashamed <S%H3637><s%> because of all that you have done, <S%H6213><s%> in that you are a comfort to them. <S%H5162><s%>

Your sisters, <S%H269><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to their former estate; <S%H6927><s%> and Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to their former estate; <S%H6927><s%> and you and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to your former estate. <S%H6927><s%>
For your sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> was not mentioned <S%H8052><s%> by your mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your pride, <S%H1347><s%>

before your wickedness <S%H7451><s%> was uncovered, <S%H1540><s%> as at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Syria, <S%H758><s%> and of all who are around <S%H5439><s%> her, <S%H1323><s%> the daughters of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> who do despite <S%H7590><s%> to you all around. <S%H5439><s%>
You have borne <S%H5375><s%> your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and your abominations, <S%H8441><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> I will also deal <S%H6213><s%> with you as you have done, <S%H6213><s%> who have despised <S%H959><s%> the oath <S%H423><s%> in breaking <S%H6565><s%> the covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

Nevertheless I will remember <S%H2142><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you in the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> and I will establish <S%H6965><s%> to you a everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

Then you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> your ways, <S%H1870><s%> and be ashamed, <S%H3637><s%> when you shall receive <S%H3947><s%> your sisters, <S%H269><s%> your elder <S%H1419><s%> sisters and your younger; <S%H6996><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them to you for daughters, <S%H1323><s%> but not by your covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you; <S%H3045><s%> and you shall know that I am Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%>

that you may remember, <S%H2142><s%> and be confounded, <S%H954><s%> and never open <S%H6610><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> any more, <S%H6440><s%> because of your shame, <S%H3639><s%> when I have forgiven <S%H3722><s%> you all that you have done, <S%H6213><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
